NewsItem.HEADLINE: Edge Computing for Enterprises 2019
NewsItem.SUMMARY: Insight into how Edge Computing business models will develop for enterprise applications.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: Deep analysis of Edge Computing for Enterprise Networks, including three business model scenarios to illustrate the interaction between Hyperscale players and Operators. Forecasts include a revenue outlook for operators and Hyperscale players related to connectivity and cloud services, as well as data center and server deployment estimates through 2024.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: Edge Computing MEC Private LTE Private 5G Cloud Data Center Server forecast
NewsItem.ATTACHMENT: MEXP-EDGEPLTE-19 rev0 ericsson.pdf, MEXP-EDGEPLTE-19 rev0 ericsson.xlsx,
